entries.npc_1: Hello.  And welcome.  Is there something I can do for you?
entries.player_1: That's nice, but no thanks.  I'm fine.
entries.npc_2: Anytime.  Just let me know if you need anything.
entries.npc_6: Good.  Now I must get back to work.
entries.npc_7: Thank you again.  I'm going to blush.
entries.npc_3: My name is Mon Mothma.  I don't think you would have heard of me.
entries.npc_4: I'm not surprised.  I try to stay out of the public eye for the most part.  Comes with the job.
entries.npc_8: Many people would die if I simply gave that information to everyone who asked.  I won't tell you just yet, but maybe if I get to know you better.
entries.player_8: Do you find it difficult to stay hidden?
entries.npc_9: Sometimes.  But there are so many things happening so quickly right now that it's becoming easier and harder at the same time.  I know, that doesn't make much sense does it?
entries.player_6: Mon Mothma?  I have heard of you!
entries.npc_5: Some people know my name.  Some know my occupation.  Hopefully you aren't a threat to me, I'd hate for us to be enemies.
entries.npc_10: Then you're safe for now.  Try not to ask too many questions in the future.
entries.player_10: I know you and what you do.
entries.npc_11: Then I hope we are allies.
